text: Hey team, looking to work with River Murphy for Sephora. Budget is approx $15,951 - need 3 x 60-second YouTube video, 3 x Twitter post, 2 x Twitter post, 2 x Podcast guest, 3 x Lifestyle photography. 4 weeks exclusivity, 6 month engagement.
